caption.title: Location of temperature, precipitation, wind speed stations and population regions generated from ArcGIS 9.3 software developed by ESRI (Environmental Systems Research Institute).
caption.p: ArcGIS 9.3 software was downloaded from http://arcmap.software.informer.com/9.3/. It includes 42 stations of temperature, precipitation and wind speed data and 41 counties population data from 2001 to 2015 in northern China.
